title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
### Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart: Your Ultimate Garden Companion

Transform your gardening and outdoor tasks with the **Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart**. Designed for durability, versatility, and ease of use, this garden cart is the perfect tool for any homeowner or gardener.

#### Key Features:

- **Durable Steel Frame**: Built to last, the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM features a robust steel frame that can handle the toughest jobs.
- **Removable Steel Mesh Sides**: Easily convert your cart into a flatbed for hauling larger items or when you need more space.
- **Quick Assembly**: No need to spend hours setting upâ€”this cart assembles quickly, so you can start using it right away.
- **10-Inch Pneumatic Tires**: Navigate through rough terrain with ease thanks to the 10-inch pneumatic tires that provide a smooth ride.
- **Tight Turn Radius and Ample Ground Clearance**: Maneuver around tight spaces and over obstacles with confidence.
- **400 lb Capacity**: Whether you're moving soil, mulch, tools, or other heavy materials, this cart can handle up to 400 pounds.
- **3 cu ft Bed**: The spacious 3 cubic foot bed is perfect for a variety of gardening and yard tasks.
- **Straight Pull Handle**: Ergonomically designed for comfortable and easy pulling.
- **1-Year Limited Warranty**: Backed by a 1-year limited warranty, you can trust the quality and durability of your Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM.

#### Dimensions and Specifications:

- **Overall Height**: 37 inches
- **Bed Dimensions**: 34 inches (L) x 18 inches (W)
- **Weight**: 36.6 pounds
- **Color**: Green

#### Why Choose Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM?

- **Versatility**: With removable sides, you can easily adapt the cart to fit your needs, whether you're hauling large items or need a flat surface.
- **Durability**: The steel mesh construction ensures that your cart will withstand the elements and heavy use.
- **Ease of Use**: Quick assembly and a tight turn radius make this cart user-friendly for all skill levels.
- **Capacity**: The 400 lb capacity and 3 cu ft bed size make it ideal for a wide range of tasks, from gardening to small construction projects.

Whether you're a seasoned gardener or a DIY enthusiast, the **Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart** is your go-to solution for efficient and effective outdoor work. Get yours today and experience the quality and reliability of Gorilla Carts!
